text: The men's 400 metres event at the 2015 Asian Athletics Championships was held on the 3 and 4 of June. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style=" text- align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold||Abdelalelah Haroun |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver||Yousef Masrahi |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze||Kentaro Sato |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 2 in each heat (Q) and the next 2 fastest (q) qualified for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center; font-size:95%" |- !Rank !!
